text: O syny Adama! Odevaytes' prilichno i vedite sebya vezhlivo i bogoboyaznenno v lyubom meste, gde vy poklonyayetes' i molites'. Naslazhdaytes' pishchey i pit'yom, razreshonnymi Allakhom, no ne izlishestvuyte; ne yesh'te i ne peyte zapreshchonnogo Allakhom. Ved' On ne lyubit izlishestvuyushchikh i neumerennykh
